text:
Another useless error message, never understand why programmers when they have
all the information to hand, always put out cryptic error messages. Thats the
difference between Engineers and Programmers.

text:
Ive tweaked the code so it now reports 

InvalidVariableException: Missing '}' after
'__property'in:"${__property(${nextTopic});}" != "done"

Ill attach a patch file later.

I presume with this the ; is in the wrong place.
